skillsDescription: -          Programming languages such as R and/or Python -          Data mining,  machine learning or predictive modelling -          Amazon Redshift or another cloud based big data platform -          Driving business decisions with recommendations to senior stakeholders
description: I am looking for a contract Data Scientist for one of the leading retailers of groceries and food in the UK.  The position will be based in central London,  and the person will be part of a new team of data scientists which the company is building to shape and develop a Big Data marketing initiative.  The Data Scientist will be an expert in Big Data technologies and tools,  and will be able to build a new Big Data infrastructure from scratch (choice of technology,  installation,  usage).
